titles: Englands tribute of tears, on the death of his Grace the Duke of Grafton, who received his mortal wound at the siege of the city of Cork in Ireland, on the 9th of October, 1690. Tune is, The watch for a wise man's observation: or, Aim not too high.
publisher: Printed for J[ohn]. Millet, at the Angel in Little-brittain.,
notes: Place of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
keywords: Grafton, Henry Fitzroy, --  Duke of, 1663-1690 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
